expressionOptions.expression: if(case when (t1.cur_arv_meds is not null and t1.vl_1 > 1000) and (timestampdiff(day,t1.vl_1_date, '{endDate}') >= 90) then true when (timestampdiff(month,t1.arv_start_date, '{endDate}') <= 12) and (t1.vl_1_date is null or timestampdiff(month,t1.vl_1_date, '{endDate}') >= 6)  and (timestampdiff(month,t1.arv_start_date, '{endDate}')>=6) then true when (timestampdiff(month,t1.arv_start_date, '{endDate}') >= 12) and (t1.vl_1_date is null or timestampdiff(month,t1.vl_1_date, '{endDate}') >= 12) then true else false end,1,0)
